leyEstatutaria: In accordance with Statutory Law 1581 of 2012, regulated by Decree No. 1377 of 2013, acting in my own name and in my capacity as Legal Representative of the company name that I represent, I authorize Enka in advance, informed, voluntary and express S.A.S., Challenger S.A.S, Operadora Habitel S.A.S, Habitel S.A.S, Fundación Challenger, Sky Forwarder S.A.S, Sky Industrial S.A.S, Sky Logística Integral S.A.S and Sky Electronics Zona Franca S.A.S to carry out the collection, treatment, storage, conservation, use, circulation, deletion, transmission and transfer of the personal data provided in this form, as well as those personal data found on publicly accessible sites and those collected biometrically, by electronic means or other available means. The purposes, rights of the owners and procedures for submitting claims associated with the management of said data can be consulted in the Personal Data Processing Policy, which is available on the website www.Enka.co
vinculadoPep: Are you a PEP person or linked to one of them?
ManejaRecursos: 1. Do you or through your position manage public resources?

hasidoPep2: Have you been PEP for the last 2 years?

Swift: Swift code (only applies to foreign accounts)
CodPostalEnvio: Postal code of the shipping address
Cumplimiento1: In accordance with the regulations that apply to you, are you obliged to implement a program to prevent money laundering/terrorist financing or proliferation of weapons of mass destruction?
Cumplimiento2: In accordance with the regulations that apply to you, are you obliged to implement a transparency and business ethics or anti-corruption program?
Cumplimiento3: Do you currently have contracts or transactions with public sector entities?
Cumplimiento4: Do you carry out activities with virtual assets and/or crypto assets?
Cumplimiento5: Exchange between Virtual Assets and fiat currencies
Cumplimiento6: Exchange between one or more forms of Virtual Assets
Cumplimiento8: Custody or administration of Virtual Assets or instruments that allow control over Virtual Assets
Cumplimiento9: Participation and provision of financial services related to an issuer's offer or sale of a Virtual Asset
Cumplimiento10: In general, services related to Virtual Assets
Cumplimiento11: December 31 of the immediately preceding year, obtained Total Income equal to or greater than three thousand (3,000) SMLMV or had Assets equal to or greater than five thousand (5,000) SMLMV
DeclaracionNombre: Name and surname of the legal representative who signs this form

AdjCertificaciones: Certifications (e.g. OEA, BASC, ISO, OSHAS, etc.)
